name: v1.0 Green Hill
description: Fancy a little nostalgic challenge? This DLC includes the old Green Hill from Sonic: Lock & Load v1.0-v1.2 as a separate episode for newer versions.

name: His World on Title Screen
description: The title screen music will be replaced with His World, like how it was in versions v0.8 and v0.9.

name: Origins Super Theme for Classic Sonic
description: Feel the power of Sonic 4 Episode III with this Super Sonic theme! Replaces Classic Sonic's Super theme with the one from Sonic Origins' version of Sonic 3 & Knuckles.

name: Sonic Frontiers-inspired Title Screen
description: The title screen music will be replaced with I'm Here, and the title map will be Hire This Zone.

name: Momentum Physics
description: This DLC takes the same physics code from v1.4 'Horizons' and applies it to your older Sonic: Lock & Load version. You'll come to a stop faster on ground, you have a good amount of mid-air control and releasing all movement keys will preserve your current momentum. You'll also jump higher if playing with versions prior to v1.3.

name: Modern Amy
description: Not a Classic Amy fan? This DLC replaces Amy's face sprites with her old v0.9 sprites that look more like Modern Amy. This is not a recreation or remaster of her v0.9 sprites -- this is simply a port and will look a bit different to the sprites used in v1.3 and above.
